posts.post_content:
Hey everyone - I'm still slowly working on a low grade T205 set, and I haven't checkin in on the board in a while. 

I wanted to see if anyone had some low grade T205s available for sale - raw, A's or 1's. I'm pretty open to any condition - cut, pieces missing, holes, stains, the works. 

Thanks! 
Mark 

Here's a list of what I am still looking for.

(2) Doc Adkins
(3) Leon Ames
(10) E.B Barger (partial "B" on cap)
(12) Emil Batch
(24) Roger P. Bresnahan (mouth open)
(28) Hick Cady
(32b) Hal Chase (both ears show, gold diamond frame ends at shoulders)
(34) Ed Cicotte
(36) Ty Cobb
(38) Eddie Collins (mouth open)
(39) Jimmy Collins
(40) Frank J. Corridon
